posts.title: About me
posts.text: 1nd Year PhD StudentI am currently a Ph.D student in ICDM Lab at University of Electronic Science and Technology of China(UESTC), and supervised by Prof. Fan Zhou. My research interests include but are not limited to topology deep learning and traffic analysis. Prior to this, I obtained a bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Science and Technology from Fujian Normal University in 2024. Email: o2cator at gmail.com [Google Scholar] [Github] News [2024/05/20] Embarking on the PhD journey! PublicationsA Survey on Graph Neural Networks for Intrusion Detection Systems: Methods, Trends and Challenges. Meihui Zhong, Mingwei Lin*, Chao Zhang, Zeshui Xu Computers & Security, 2024. [Paper] Dynamic multi-scale topological representation for enhancing network intrusion detection Meihui Zhong, Mingwei Lin*, Zhu He Computers & Security, 2023. Paper
